note:
And, as Masayoshi Son (SoftBank) likes to say:

“Whoever controls data controls the world.”

That’s Masayoshi Son’s vision: a future where every time that we use our smartphone, or call a taxi, or order a meal, or stay in a hotel, or make a payment, or receive medical treatment, we will be doing so in a data transaction with a company that belongs to the SoftBank family.

(SoftBank Group Corp. is a Japanese multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered in Minato, Tokyo)👁‍🗨🌐📵
